name: 3D Karate Fight
description:
Fight till the end against your opponents on a one on one face off until you are the last man standing. Fist of Awesome, wrestling, Ninja fighting.
Become a wrestling champion and beat all your opponents.
The ultimate battle between Indian and Egyptian mythology.

Features:
1. unlimited in pure 3D game
2. full contact battle
3. fight in styles like Taekwondo, Kung Fu, and Kickboxing
4. hand to hand combat
5. fight in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu
6. Wrestling and Boxing style fighting
